thread.title: AsianDate???s Recent Survey Reveals the Favorite Pastimes of Romantic Members
thread.title_full: AsianDate???s Recent Survey Reveals the Favorite Pastimes of Romantic Members

title: AsianDate???s Recent Survey Reveals the Favorite Pastimes of Romantic Members
text: AsianDates Recent Survey Reveals the Favorite Pastimes of Romantic Members September 08, 2015 -- AsianDate shares details of their recent member survey, which aimed to unravel the most passionate pastimes of members. AsianDate , the online dating service helping singles worldwide find their ideal Asian partners, has released the results of a recent member survey. The survey aimed to learn more about the way members choose to spend their leisure time. According to AsianDates dating experts, finding areas of common interest is the key to success in online dating . It provides members with the opportunity to compare their views on shared areas of interest, which often works as an effective ice-breaker. It is clear from the results of the survey that reading is the most favorite pastime of AsianDate members. Most members prefer burying their head in a book when they have some time to spare. Reading is an intelligent pursuit which keeps the mind in great shape and helps keep the memory active. It gives people lots of knowledge and plenty to talk about when they date. The survey also found travel is another deep passion of many AsianDate members . This is only to be expected because when members date partners from across geographical borders, traveling becomes inevitable at some stage of the online relationship. The choice of travel as a pastime also reflects the adventurous spirit of members. Those who have a passion for travel like to explore new places and often have an open mind. Such partners can be said to be mature and highly interesting. AsianDates survey lists hanging out with friends as the third best hobby of members. These singles enjoy spending their spare time in the company of their friends. Many AsianDate members are socially active and believe in remaining in regular touch with their close friends. The lively and healthy online atmosphere at AsianDate reflects the friendly nature of members. According to the survey, watching television, enjoying movies, listening to music, cooking, and keeping fit and healthy through exercise and sports are also on the favorite list of pastimes. There is a wide range of activities that members love to indulge in when they have free time on their hands. AsianDate members are able to communicate effectively and share their views on various things easily due to the highly advanced dating tools and features offered by the popular online dating service. Chat and CamShare are two of the most popular dating tools members love to use when they log in to AsianDate. For more information, visit www.AsianDate.com About AsianDate: AsianDate is part of the Anastasia Family, founded in 1993, which offers premium international dating to facilitate exciting and romantic companionship online between men and women all over the world. The Anastasia Family includes AsianDate.com, AnastasiaDate.com, AmoLatina.com, ArabianDate.com and AfricaBeauties.com, which bring together over 20 million international users and more than 150 million online visitors annually. Additionally, over 2.5 million conversations are exchanged onsite daily. AsianDate is committed to member safety, customer satisfaction and the ongoing pursuit of innovation. Headquartered in New York, the Anastasia Family has additional representation in every country it touches providing a high level of customer service to a worldwide clientele. All members are able to communicate across a variety of top-notch multimedia platforms, including video chat and a mobile app for Android devices available in Google Play. Media Contact Contact Person: Elizabeth Maxim, Marketing Maven Email: elizabeth@marketingmavenpr.com
